title: The Last Olympian
description: Alternate cover edition can be found here at The Last OlympianThe greatest monster of all, the storm giant Typhon, is on the loose, wreaking havoc and destruction across the U.S. - while Kronos's army lays siege to Manhattan. Soon Percy Jackson must make the hardest choice of his life - a choice that will save or destroy the world.
author: Rick Riordan
